about_the_game:
The complete Memento of Spring soundtrack. Both Ogg and Flac formats included.

Soundtrack listing

1. Remember Yesterday With A Smile
2. A Cat In The Sun
3. Joyful Skip
4. A Moment Of Clarity
5. Happiness Is An Apple Strudel
6. Hours By The Seconds
7. Wakeless Nights
8. Closing Shop
9. Rainy Spring
10. Memories That Bloom
11. A Day In The Life
12. Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star
13. Pitter Patter
14. March Of The Deranged Bakers
15. Quietly, Quietly
16. The Calamity Princess

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible card
